english.segment1: When I was out, By myself I was alone, Always talking on the phone, No-ones listening baby.
english.segment2: As for love, I tried it once, it broke my heart. Maybe I was too young, Its too much effort baby.
english.segment3: Hey, what's that sound, What's that sound. Something is rumbling in my soul, Making its way to my back door. Dragging me to my feet for one more time.
english.segment4: I can ignore, Someone knocking down my door. I just sit here on the floor'. Its too much effort baby.
english.segment5: Hey, what's that sound, What's that sound. Something is rumbling in my soul, Making its way to my back door. Dragging me to my feet for one more time.
